strategy.title: Overview
steps: Complete all hard mode achievements in Ulduar
Some achievements require specific mechanics, not just DPS

strategy.title: Key Achievements
steps: Orbit-uary: Kill Flame Leviathan with all 4 towers active - high damage, burst quickly
Firefighter: Activate Mimiron hard mode by pressing the red button - complex fight
One Light in the Darkness: Kill Yogg-Saron with only 1 Keeper assisting
I Love the Smell of Saronite: Kill 8 Saronite Vapors within 3 seconds on Vezax

strategy.title: Tips
steps: Bring a friend for achievements requiring specific positioning
Watch video guides for Firefighter - many overlapping mechanics
Yogg-Saron portals still require entering even at max level
